metadata.name: Nostalgia
metadata.description:
About this NFT painting

" A quiet afternoon, can you feel it ?  The moment back then when you had no concerns, life was easier".

What would he think on his little cloud? 
Is he going back home to have some rest?
Is he in love right now? 
Does he ever went on vacation?
Where is his favorite place?
There was a moment in his life, where the constant need of fight was resting and his mind was full of dreams, full of peace. 
Surrounded by the calmness, a bit of nostalgic sets in, leaving a little seed deep inside his heart. That seed one day will bloom suddently, like a ravenous animal, dipping him with tremendous joyful sadness. That seed is Nostalgia, a painful happiness that brings him those moments, when he was young and full of ambitions and dreams...
Can you relate? 
Can you feel Nostalgia?
